Module description¶

Node Editor Window¶

class node_editor.NodeEditorWindow¶

Main application window

Contains :

  • menubar with File, Edit

  • statusbar displaying cursor position on the scene

  • NodeEditorWidget instance containing a graphics view and the scene

closeEvent(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QCloseEvent) → None¶

Close if no change is detected, else prompt a dialog asking to save.

createMenus()¶

Utility function, instanciate actions from the menubar

createStatusBar()¶

Utility function, instantiate the status bar notifying the cursor position in the scene

getCurrentNodeEditorWidget() → node_editor.node_editor_widget.NodeEditorWidget¶

Return the widget currently holding the scene.

For different application, the method can be overridden to return mdiArea, the central widget…

Returns

Node editor Widget. The widget holding the scene.

Return type

NodeEditorWidget

initUI()¶

Initialize main window UI setup

maybeSave()¶

Handling the dialog asking to save the file when closing the window

Returns

  • True : if change are saved or discarded

  • False : if change are canceled

Return type

bool

onEditCopy()¶

Copy callback

onEditCut()¶

Cut callback

onEditDelete()¶

Delate callback

onEditPaste()¶

Paste callback

onEditRedo()¶

Redo callback

onEditUndo()¶

Undo callback

onFileNew()¶

Clear the scene after prompting dialod asking to save

onFileOpen()¶

Open OpenFileDialog

onFileSave() → bool¶

Save file without dialog. Overwrite filename. Return True if save is not canceled and successful.

onFileSaveAs() → bool¶

Open SaveAs dialog. Return True if save is not canceled and successful.

onScenePosChanged(x, y)¶

Update mouse position to status bar

setTitle()¶

Handle title change updon modification of the scene

Node Editor Widgets¶

class node_editor.NodeEditorWidget(parent=None)¶

Widget holding the graphics view and the scene

addNodes()¶

Add nodes for debug purpose

fileLoad(filename: str) → bool¶
Parameters

filename (str) – Path of the file to load

Returns

  • True : if the file is successfully loaded

  • False : in case of error

Return type

bool

getUserFriendlyFilename()¶
initUI()¶

Initialize widget UI

Scene¶

class node_editor.node_scene.Scene¶

Implement the logic behind the scene being displayed.

Contains the nodes, the edges

addEdge(edge)¶

Append edge to the list of edges

addHasBeenModifiedListener(callback: function)¶

Add callabck to call everytime the scene is modified

addNode(node)¶

Append node to the list of nodes

clear()¶

Clear the scene by calling remove() on all the nodes

deserialize(data, hashmap={}, restore_id=True)¶

Deserialize the scene by recursively calling deserialize function on each node and edges.

loadFromFile(filename)¶

Load graph from filename

removeEdge(edge)¶

Remove edge from the list of edges

removeNode(node)¶

Remove node from the list of nodes

saveToFile(filename)¶

Save current graph to filename

serialize()¶

Serialize the scene.

Call serialize from each object, nodes and edges. Following parameters are serialized :

  • scene width

  • scene height

  • nodes

  • edges
